formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'LookupCIDName' =-
[Synopsis] Look up CallerID Name from local database
[Description] LookupCIDName: Looks up the Caller*ID number on the active channel in the Asterisk database (family 'cidname') and sets the Caller*ID name. Does nothing if no Caller*ID was received on the channel. This is useful if you do not subscribe to Caller*ID name delivery, or if you want to change the names on some incoming calls.
LookupCIDName is deprecated. Please use ${DB(cidname/${CALLERID(num)})} instead.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -10,3 +10,6 @@ channel. This is useful if you do not subscribe to Caller*ID name delivery, or if you want to change the names on some incoming calls. + + LookupCIDName is deprecated. Please use ${DB(cidname/${CALLERID(num)})} + instead.
